<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4844) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 16), [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247) (Level 16), [Avenger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=282) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4831)

</column>

---

Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes. You can use Twin Riposte even if you aren’t benefiting from Twin Parry. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to make a Twin Riposte.
